set.name: DM22-EX2 Heroes Darkside Pack: The Kirifudas of Darkness

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command Dragon/Revolutionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger: Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may reveal this creature from your hand. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution darkness creature, put that creature and put this creature on top of it. ■ Evolution: Put on one of your darkness creatures. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or it attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's tapped creatures and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Evolution: Put on one of your darkness command creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy all non-darkness cards in the battle zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Zombie Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Graveyard Vortex evolution—Choose 2 darkness creatures in your graveyard and put this creature on top of those creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, put the top 6 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Whenever one of your dragons attack, you may put a darkness creature that costs less than that creature from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules

If you do, ignore that creature's abilities until the end of the turn. ■ Each of your other Commands get "slayer".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Oniend: Whenever a creature attacks, if there is a player that has no shields and you have at least one darkness card and one fire card in your mana zone, you may summon this creature from your hand for no cost. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

property.value: Dispector/World Command Dragon/Distas

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever a card is put from your shield zone into your graveyard, if it's a Distas or Dispector that costs the same as or or less than the number of cards in your mana zone, put it. Otherwise, add it to your hand. ■ Each of your other creatures get "Sasagale 2".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ At the start of your opponent's turn, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature attacks this turn if able. ■ Your light creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Your darkness creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Your nature creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-EX2 Heroes Darkside Pack: The Kirifudas of Darkness

property.name: Rules
property.value: {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) ■ At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone, you may use it for no cost. If that card costs more than the number of cards in your mana zone, or if you don't use it, put that card into your mana zone. ■ At the end of your opponent's turn, discard all cards from your hand.

property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. {SUPER}: Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then put a non-evolution darkness creature from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or at the start of your turn, draw a card and discard a card from your hand. Then if you have 3 or more creatures in your graveyard, you may put a God that costs 5 or less or an Origin that costs 5 or less from your graveyard. If you do, destroy this creature.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-EX2 Heroes Darkside Pack: The Kirifudas of Darkness

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Sympathy: God in your graveyard (This spell costs 1 less to cast for each of your Gods in your graveyard. It can't cost less than 1.) ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ You may put a creature from your graveyard. Then you may put and link any number of Gods from your graveyard that can be linked to it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your darkness or fire creatures. {INVASION}-Darkness or Fire Command (When one of your Darkness or Fire Commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, discard any number of cards from your hand. Then draw cards equal to that number plus 1.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following: ► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 8 or less: ► Put a creature that costs 8 or less from your graveyard. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, you may choose both.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-EX2 Heroes Darkside Pack: The Kirifudas of Darkness

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ONIEND}: Whenever a creature attacks, if there is a player that has no shields and you have at least one darkness card and one fire card in your mana zone, you may cast this spell from your hand for no cost. ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. From among the cards put into your graveyard in this way, choose a darkness or fire non-evolution creature that costs 6 or less and put it. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Race
property.value: Phoenix/Armored Dragon/Zombie Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Deck Galaxy Vortex Evolution: Put this creature on top of the top 3 cards of your deck. (Put the cards from your deck face down without looking at them.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Meteorburn: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put any number of cards under this creature into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard in this way, each of your opponent's creatures gets -4000 power until the end of the turn. ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, choose 2 of your opponent's shields and put them into their owner's graveyard.

(To seal a card, put the top of your deck face down on it. Sealed creatures are ignored.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Sonic Command/S-Rank Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on a darkness or fire creature. ■ S-Rank Invasion "Lightning Sonic": Darkness or Fire Command (When one of your darkness or fire commands attacks, you may put this creature from your hand, your graveyard, or the battle zone on top of it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, your opponent puts a seal on all their creatures that have the lowest power. (To seal a card, put the top of your deck face down on it. Sealed creatures are ignored.)

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: {REVOLUTION CHANGE}-Darkness or Fire Dragoncosts 5 or more(When one of your Darkness or Fire Dragonscosts 5 or moreattacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your Dragons gets "speed attacker". ■ When this creature leaves, you may put a creature that costs 6 or less from your graveyard.

If it's a creature that costs 5 or less, you may put it.

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or it attacks, you may cast a spell that has "shield trigger" from your graveyard for no cost. If you do, after you cast, shieldify it face up instead of your graveyard. ■ Whenever you cast a spell, choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs less than that spell and destroy it.

When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone, one in their mana zone and one from your opponent's hand at random. Your opponent puts them into their graveyard. ■ At the end of your turn, choose a player. That player draws 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Galaxy Vortex Omega Evolution: Choose a creature from your graveyard, mana zone and battle zone and put this card on top of them. ■ Extra EX Life (As you put this creature, shieldify the top 2 cards of your deck. When this creature would leave, put one of its shields into your graveyard instead.) {WORLD BREAKER} ■ Whenever an "EX Life" shield leaves your shield zone, put a card under this creature into the graveyard. If it's a non-evolution creature, put it from your graveyard. ■ Each of your Dispectors in your shield zone gets "Guard Strike".

Then you may choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts them into their graveyard.
